name: Bait (itch) (Crescent Eye Interactive)
description:
(Download the game if it doesn't run well in browser!)

Objective

You are the blue circle.

The red triangle is after you.

BAIT the triangle into the green box.

Don't BAIT yourself.

Oh, another thing.

Look out for other obstacles.

Controls

WASD to move.

Smack SPACE to begin.

Any questions?

Credits
